input.sentences: wednesday night is always dinner night with my friends .

output.sentences: A business meeting was being held at a hibachi.
It was a peaceful day at the building making for a good business atmosphere.
Afterward they decided to walk back to the office.
The streets were much more busy.
They reached their office building after the short walk.
